name: Household Appliance Stores
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that sell household appliances. Products for sale may
include gas or electric ranges and stoves, ovens, refrigerators,
dishwashers, water heaters, washers, dryers, garbage disposals,
sewing machines, self-contained air conditioning units, and vacuum
cleaners. Such merchants may or may not also conduct repair work.
For merchants that primarily conduct repair work, use MCC 7623,
MCC 7629, or MCC 7699 as appropriate.
